text: Then take the Levites for me—I am the LORD—in place of all the firstborn of the Israelites, as well as the Levites’ cattle, in place of all the firstborn among the cattle of the Israelites.

When the merchants of the region heard of their prowess, they came to the camp, bringing a huge sum of silver and gold, along with fetters, to buy the Israelites as slaves. A force from Edom and from Philistia joined with them.
Let us lift up our hearts as well as our hands toward God in heaven!
And now we follow you with our whole heart, we fear you and we seek your face. Do not put us to shame,
